name: Startup Organization
description: Lean framework for pre-seed to seed stage start-ups (0-10 people) focused on speed, iteration, and product-market fit
target_audience: Pre-seed to seed stage start-ups (0-10 people), founders wearing multiple hats, fast iteration focus

included_files..claude/role-guides: Role guides directory (to be populated as needed)

when_to_use: Founders still searching for product-market fit
Need speed and fast iteration over formal processes
graduation_path: Consider moving to software-org template when: 50+ people, Series B+ funding, multiple products/systems, need formal processes/compliance, management layers established

changes: Initial release bundled with role-context-manager v1.1.0
